00046 class parameter {
00047     typedef boost::function< void () >  user_func_without_arg;
00048     typedef std::set< size_t >          orders_storage; 
00049 public:
00050     explicit parameter( const std::string&   short_name
00051                         , const std::string& full_name
00052                         , void ( *fn )() ) :
00053             func_without_arg( fn ) {
00054         init( short_name, full_name );
00055     } 
00056     
00057     template< typename ArgType >
00058     explicit parameter( const std::string&   short_name
00059                         , const std::string& full_name
00060                         , void ( *fn )( const ArgType& ) ) :
00061             for_arg( boost::make_shared< argument_holder<ArgType> >( fn ) ) {
00062         init( short_name, full_name );
00063     }
00064 
00065     template< typename ArgType >
00066     explicit parameter( const std::string&   short_name
00067                         , const std::string& full_name
00068                         , void ( *fn )( ArgType ) ) :
00069             for_arg( boost::make_shared< argument_holder<ArgType> >( fn ) ) {
00070         init( short_name, full_name );
00071     }
00072 
00073     template< typename ObjectType >
00074     explicit parameter( const std::string&   short_name
00075                         , const std::string& full_name
00076                         , ObjectType* obj
00077                         , void ( ObjectType::*fn )() ) :
00078             func_without_arg( boost::bind( fn, obj ) ) {
00079         init( short_name, full_name );
00080     }
00081     
00082     template< typename ObjectType >
00083     explicit parameter( const std::string&   short_name
00084                         , const std::string& full_name
00085                         , ObjectType* obj
00086                         , void ( ObjectType::*fn )() const ) :
00087             func_without_arg( boost::bind( fn, obj ) ) {
00088         init( short_name, full_name );
00089     }
00090 
00091     template
00092     < 
00093         typename ObjectType
00094         , typename ArgType 
00095     >
00096     explicit parameter( const std::string&   short_name
00097                         , const std::string& full_name
00098                         , ObjectType* obj
00099                         , void ( ObjectType::*fn )( const ArgType& ) ) :
00100             for_arg( boost::make_shared< argument_holder<ArgType> >( obj, fn ) ) {
00101         init( short_name, full_name );
00102     }
00103     
00104     template
00105     < 
00106         typename ObjectType
00107         , typename ArgType 
00108     >
00109     explicit parameter( const std::string&   short_name
00110                         , const std::string& full_name
00111                         , ObjectType* obj
00112                         , void ( ObjectType::*fn )( const ArgType& ) const ) :
00113             for_arg( boost::make_shared< argument_holder<ArgType> >( obj, fn ) ) {
00114         init( short_name, full_name );
00115     }

00119         typename ObjectType

00123                         , const std::string& full_name
00124                         , ObjectType* obj
00125                         , void ( ObjectType::*fn )( ArgType ) ) :
00126             for_arg( boost::make_shared< argument_holder<ArgType> >( obj, fn ) ) {
00127         init( short_name, full_name );

00130     template
00131     < 
00132         typename ObjectType
00133         , typename ArgType
00134     >
00135     explicit parameter( const std::string&   short_name
00136                         , const std::string& full_name
00137                         , ObjectType* obj
00138                         , void ( ObjectType::*fn )( ArgType ) const ) :
00139             for_arg( boost::make_shared< argument_holder<ArgType> >( obj, fn ) ) {
00140         init( short_name, full_name );
00141     } 
00142 private:
00143     void init( const std::string& _short_name, const std::string& _full_name ) {   
00144         short_name           = _short_name;
00145         full_name            = _full_name;
00146         is_necessary         = false;
00147         is_has_default_value = false;
00148         semantic             = no_semantic;
00149         order_number         = 0;
00150     } 
00151 public:
00152     std::string             short_name;
00153     std::string             full_name;
00154     bool                    is_necessary;
00155     bool                    is_has_default_value;
00156     any                     for_arg;
00157     user_func_without_arg   func_without_arg;
00158     value_semantic          semantic;
00159     int                     order_number;
00160     static orders_storage   orders;
00161 public:
00162     bool has_default_value() const { return is_has_default_value; }
00163     bool it_is_necessary() const { return is_necessary; }
00164 public:
00165     parameter& check_semantic( const value_semantic& _semantic ) {
00166         check_semantic_validity( _semantic );
00167         semantic = _semantic;
00168         return *this;
00169     }
00170 private:
00171     void check_semantic_validity( const value_semantic& _semantic ) const {
00172         if ( _semantic < no_semantic || _semantic > email ) {
00173             const std::string what_happened = lib_prefix()
00174                     + "Incorrect value of semantic, supports only 'path', 'ipv4', 'ipv6', 'ip' and 'email'!";
00175             throw std::invalid_argument( what_happened );
00176         } else {}
00177     }
00178 public:
00179     parameter& necessary() {
00180         check_parameter_default_value_existence();
00181         is_necessary = true;
00182         return *this;
00183     }
00184 private:
00185     void check_validity_of_string_default_value( const any& value ) const {
00186         if ( typeid( std::string ) == value.type() ) {
00187             const std::string value_as_string = boost::any_cast< std::string >( value );
00188             if ( boost::contains( value_as_string, " " ) ) {
00189                 const std::string what_happened = lib_prefix() 
00190                                                   + "Invalid default parameter's value '" + short_name 
00191                                                   + "': it shouldn't contains space(s)!";
00192                 throw std::invalid_argument( what_happened );
00193             } else {}
00194         } else {}
00195     } 
00196 
00197     void check_parameter_necessity() const {
00198         if ( is_necessary ) {
00199             const std::string what_happened = lib_prefix() 
00200                                               + "Parameter '" + short_name
00201                                               + "' defined as necessary, it cannot have default value!"; 
00202             throw std::logic_error( what_happened );
00203         } else {}
00204     }
00205 
00206     void check_parameter_default_value_existence() const {
00207         if ( is_has_default_value ) {
00208             const std::string what_happened = lib_prefix()
00209                                               + "Parameter '" + short_name 
00210                                               + "' already have default value, it cannot be necessary!"; 
00211             throw std::logic_error( what_happened );
00212         } else {}
00213     }
00214 private:
00215     argument_caster caster;
00216 public:
00217     parameter& default_value( const any& value ) {
00218         check_parameter_necessity();
00219         check_validity_of_string_default_value( value );
00220         is_has_default_value = true;
00221         caster.store_default_value( for_arg, value, short_name );
00222         return *this;
00223     }
00224 private:
00225 template< typename ExpectedType >
00226     ExpectedType check_type_of_default_value( const any& value ) const {
00227         ExpectedType default_value;
00228         if ( typeid( default_value ) == value.type() ) {
00229             default_value = boost::any_cast< ExpectedType >( value );
00230         } else {
00231             const std::string what_happened = lib_prefix() 
00232                                               + "Incorrect default value's type of parameter '" 
00233                                               + short_name + "'!";
00234             throw std::invalid_argument( what_happened );
00235         }
00236         return default_value;
00237     }
00238 public:
00242     parameter& default_value( const char* value ) {
00243         return default_value( std::string( value ) );
00244     }
00245 public:
00246     parameter& order( int _order_number ) {
00247         order_number = _order_number;
00248         check_order_validity();
00249         check_order_uniqueness(); 
00250         return *this;
00251     }
00252 private:
00253     void check_order_validity() const {
00254         if ( order_number < 1 ) {
00255             o_stream what_happened;
00256             what_happened << lib_prefix()
00257                           << "Invalid order number '" << order_number << "' "
00258                           << "(parameter '" << short_name << "'), "
00259                           << "it cannot be less than 1!";
00260             throw std::invalid_argument( what_happened.str() );
00261         } else {}
00262     }
00263 
00264     void check_order_uniqueness() {
00265         const size_t current_orders_quantity = orders.size();
00266         orders.insert( order_number );
00267         const size_t new_orders_quantity = orders.size();
00268         if ( current_orders_quantity == new_orders_quantity ) {
00269             const std::string what_happened = lib_prefix() + "Parameter's order number must be unique!";
00270             throw std::logic_error( what_happened );
00271         } else {}
00272     }
00273 public:
00274     bool operator==( const std::string& parameter_name ) const {
00275         return parameter_name == short_name || parameter_name == full_name;
00276     }
00277 
00278     bool operator==( int _order_number ) const {
00279         return _order_number == order_number;
00280     }
00281 };
00282 
00283 parameter::orders_storage parameter::orders;
00284 
00285 } // namespace detail
